Projects

A collection of projects I have worked on

Arkham Print

ArkhamPrint.xyz is a small project to help players of an LCG game to print out cards at home. It was inspired by a similar project that since went defunct.

Read More

Super Starkiller 3000

SUPER STARKILLER 3000 is a 2D action / bullet hell game made in Javascript using Phaser.

Read More

Dungeons And Dragons Blogs

I ran a 5th Edtion Dungeons and Dragons campaign for a few years and wrote some blog articles about it.

Drone Control

Drone Control was my senior project at UHCL, a 3D drone flight simulator and control platform, built in Java and Javascript with LibGDX

Read More

Pac Dan

Pac Dan is a true-to-the-original clone of the arcade classic Pacman made using Java and LibGDX

Read More

Rock Band

I worked as a QA Tester and am credited on multiple Rock Band game releases.
